<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Soothing Words](/Spells.aspx?ID=452)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 396 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

You attempt to calm the target by uttering soothing words in a calm and even tone. The target gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 against emotion effects.

 In addition, when you Cast this Spell, you can attempt to counteract one emotion effect on the target.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The bonus to saves increases to +2, or +3 against emotion effects.
name: Soothing Words
